message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $150 is still a fair price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $130 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
